rows.name: Brilliant
rows.description: The item emits brief flashes of bright light whenever it is activated. The creator determines the color upon selecting the trait.

rows.name: Clean
rows.description: The item never becomes stained or dirty.

rows.name: Comfortable
rows.description: The item is soothing and relaxing to wear or hold.

rows.name: Crude
rows.description: Appears made from base materials with shoddy workmanship.

rows.name: Dreadful
rows.description: Bears frightening emblems (skulls, leering faces) that seem to move when activated or used; creator chooses specifics.

rows.name: Fashionable
rows.description: Particularly attractive in appearance.

rows.name: Flickering
rows.description: Flickers with a faint black flame too dim to provide illumination.

rows.name: Gaudy
rows.description: Brightly colored or covered in numerous fake jewels; might shimmer with faint rainbow light.

rows.name: Glowing
rows.description: Sheds light equal to a candle for 1 round upon activation or when a charge is expended.

rows.name: Heavy
rows.description: Feels unusually heavy when held; actual weight unchanged.

rows.name: Loud
rows.description: Upon activation emits an incongruous sound (lion’s roar, strong chord, short exclamation).

rows.name: Multicolored
rows.description: Item’s coloration changes at random intervals.

rows.name: Religious
rows.description: Bears a particular faith’s symbol and incorporates that faith’s icons/colors.

rows.name: Shadowy
rows.description: Dead black in color; seems to swallow light that shines upon it.

rows.name: Shrouded
rows.description: Perpetually shrouded in a faint aura of cool mist.

rows.name: Sizzling
rows.description: Emits a faint, burning hiss whenever it strikes flesh.

rows.name: Slimy
rows.description: Faint residue of slime coats the item at all times.

rows.name: Smoky
rows.description: Emits a faintly visible trail of smoke when held.

rows.name: Sparking
rows.description: Gives off sparks when it strikes a foe or is struck.

rows.name: Totemic
rows.description: Decorated with fetishes, carvings, and markings identifying it as sacred to a specific tribe or group.

rows.name: Warped
rows.description: Constructed in an odd manner with curves or protrusions unlike known methods.

rows.name: Writhing
rows.description: Upon activation, briefly twists and writhes like a snake.
